question_description: How would you rate the mbta overall?
How would you rate your most recent trip?
How likely are you to continue using the mbta in the future?
How likely are you to recommend the mbta to a friend or colleague?
The mbta provides reliable public transportation services.
The mbta is a cost-conscious organization.
The mbta uses technology to meet the needs and demands of its riders.
The mbta is a good value for the money.
The mbta has a fleet of trains and buses that are clean and well maintained.
